channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Late payments to nonprofits hamper California’s fight against homelessness
item.description: California’s homeless service providers have a problem: They aren’t getting paid on time, and it’s making it even harder for them to get people off the street.

item.title: Marketing plans are key for small businesses ahead of a tough holiday shopping season
item.description: The holidays are the busiest time of year for many small retailers and other businesses. But the holidays this year could be particularly challenging.

item.title: US sanctions extremist West Bank settler group for violence against Palestinians
item.description: The U.S. on Tuesday imposed sanctions on Hilltop Youth — a group of extremist settlers in the Israeli-occupied West Bank who attack Palestinians and their property, as well as two Israeli men connected to violence against Palestinians.
